description: Addition of a brick bin store with timber doors.  Timber trellis to be fitted to the adjoining boundary walls to proivde screening between the station entrance and the scrap metal yards either side of the building.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

Design and Access Statement (BAQUS May 2011), 002385.005RA, 002385.006RA (Proposed Site Plan), 002385.006RA (Existing Site Layout), 002385.015RA, 002385.0016RA (South Elevation Proposed), 002385.0016RA (South Elevation as Existing), 002385.0016RA (North Elevation Existing), 002385.0016RA (Right Elevation), 002385.0016RA (Right hand elevation showing bin store), 002385.0016RA (Side elevation of Bin Store), 002385.018RA (Existing side section), 002385.018RA (Proposed Site Section), 002385.0019RA, 002385.020RA, 002385.021RA, 002385.32RA. 

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
